Title: Expands the exemption provided to professional journalists and newscasters from contempt to include employment or association with a web log
Summary: Expands the exemption provided to professional journalists and newscasters from contempt to include employment or association with a web log; defines web log as a website or webpage that contains an online journal containing news, comments and offers hyperlinks provided by the writer.
LawCode: Amd ยง79-h, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to exemptions provided to professional journalists and newscasters from contempt
